metadata.title: Brand Me Men's Genuine Leather Pure Lambskin Biker Jacket BM011
features: ✔️OUTER SHELL: We use only the finest leather in the market. The leather is our passion. We source the best leather skins which use traditional methods to produce batches of the most incredible, Soft Lambskin Genuine Nappa Leather.
✔️SIZE : Refer our size chart and Size guide. We add 5-6 inches to actual body CHEST SIZE.

✔️We guarantee the style & Color is the same as it is in the original picture.The jacket color will be same as shown in the listing item. Slight color variations possible due to differing screening and photograph resolutions.
description: ♦ Brand New with Tags ♦ Real Nappa Lambskin Leather ♦ Satin Lining Inside ♦ YKK Zipper ♦ Hardware : Gold, Silver and Gun Metal Available ♦MATERIAL We use only premium napa lambskin leather. Leather is our passion. We source the best leather skins and use incredible, butter-soft Nappa Leather. ♦CRAFTSMANSHIP We work with the best tailor. All our products are hand crafted in our workshops. Each jacket is hand checked before being shipped out. DESIGN Our purpose is to provide the good design with the cool biker look for the people who believe in style and riding. We are always committed to the better designs. YKK ZIPPER We use durable, polished YKK Hardware in four custom finishes: Gun Metal, Silver, Gold and Antique Brass. PREMIUM ♦INSIDE MATERIAL Premium Satin linings can be found in different fibers. Satin lining has a good weight and is perfect for adding a bit more substance to inside. COLOUR All our inventory come in wide range of colour and it’s shades.
